author: Simon Difford
description: Fennel and pastis freshen and delicately flavour Scotch with the merest hint of apple. Best made by infusing the fennel with the scotch whisky for a week or so rather than muddling.
name: Fen Ella
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
